data.text: Kuya Yesu kalongotsighwa na Ghumuhe we Imulungu mbaka kunyika yaghetsighwe na Yehile.
Tsakafunga ukuja ghamatsuwa alubaini chilo na misi, kuya tsakona nzala.
Baho Setani kamghendela, kamlongela, “Ka ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu, ghalongele ghamabwe ghano ghawe pfighate.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Yandikighwa mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka. ‘Imunu ng'odaha bae kuwa mghima kwa chijo chiliyeka, ila kwa chila imbuli iyolonga Imulungu.’ ”
Kuya Setani kamsola Yesu mbaka Yerusalemu, ghumji ghwenzeluke, kamwika mchiswili ghendo mwe Ing'anda ye Imulungu.
Kuya kamlongela, “Ka ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu, wilaghatse hasi, kwaapfila yandikighwa,
Yesu kamwidika, “Pfipfila yandikighwa, ‘Uleke kumghetsa Imtwatsa Imulungu wako.’ ”
Kuya Setani kamsola keli mbaka mne chidando chitali ng'ani, kamlangusa undewa wose we isi na ukulu wose we isi.
Kuya kamlongela, “Ung'enama hambele hangu na kunitamanila, nitsokwing'a ghano ghose.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Ghenda Setani! Kwaapfila yandikighwa, ‘Umtamanile Imtwatsa Imulungu wako, umtumikile yeye yaliyeka!’ ”
Kuya Setani kamleka Yesu, na wamalaika watsa wamtumikila.
Yesu hayahulike Yohane wamwika mchifungo, koka Galilaya.
Kalawa Natsareti, kaghenda kukala Kaperinaumu, isi iili habehi ne tsimbu lya Galilaya, na iibakane ne isi ya Sabuloni na ya Nafutali.
Achino chitendeka ili achila chayalongile nabii Isaya chitimile,
“Isi ya Sabuloni na isi ya Nafutali,
“Iwanu iwokala mchisi
Kulawa matsuwa agho Yesu kanza kuwapetela usenga wake, “Mleke kutenda nzambi, kwaapfila undewa wa kulanga wa habehi.”
Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu lya Galilaya, kawona iwandughu weli, Simoni iyakemighwe Petiri na ndughu yake Andereya. Tsawang'ali wolowa iwasomba kwa nyapfu mne tsimbu lya.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mniwinze, nani nitsowatenda muwe iwalowa we iwanu.”
Bahala watsileka nyapfu tsawo, wamuwinza.
Haghendile hambele chidogho, kawona iwandughu wangi weli, Jakobu imwana we Sebedayo na ndughu yake Yohane. Tsawakala mne mnumbwi hamwe na aba wawo Sebedayo, wotenda nyapfu tsawo. Yesu kawakema,
bahala waghuleka mnumbwi na aba wawo, wamuwinza.
Yesu tsakanga Galilaya yose, kalangulitsa mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela, kawapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile ye Undewa we Imulungu na kawahonetsa iwanu wane matamu ghose.
Mbuli tsake tsenela mne isi yose ya Siriya, apfo iwanu wamghalila iwatamu wose, iwoghula utamu wowose, awala iwodununzika, wane pfinyamkela, iwakughwa chisala na awala iwaholole, naye kawahonetsa.
Na iwanu wengi wamuwinza kulawa Galilaya, isi tsa Dekapoli, Yerusalemu, Yudeya ne isi ili kumwambu mwa ghumto Yoridani.
